Class YamlOutputFormatter

Namespace
Ddap.Rest.Formatters
Assembly
Ddap.Rest.dll

Custom output formatter for YAML content type. Supports content negotiation for YAML format based on Accept header.

public class YamlOutputFormatter : TextOutputFormatter, IOutputFormatter, IApiResponseTypeMetadataProvider
